page.title: 05GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: For the game {longlamp} you need at least 3 people. One or 2 people can go "on it" but one is more likely . We play {longlamp} on the schoolyard. People who are not "on it" stay at one end of the yard. The person "on it" chooses someone randomly; this person must dodge past the person "on it" to get to the other end of the yard . If this person is not successful, i.e. is caught , he/she is "on it" also , and chooses ,randomly , the next runner . If "stampede" is called all runners attempt to pass . The game is most exciting when played by 2 "gangs" , one "on it" one not . The last person to be caught restarts the game . I chose to describe this game because it is exciting, although rough . A similar game, {bulldog}, differs only in that people caught must be floored. (Game described by Debbie, aged 11 .)
